Hero.headline: Your Next Adventure Starts Here
Hero.subHeadline: Follow us as we capture the magic of travel and uncover the secrets of the world's most enchanting destinations.

Guides.title: Discover the Magic of Paris
Guides.subTitle: Your ultimate guide to the City of Light. Explore iconic landmarks, savor local cuisine, and immerse yourself in Parisian culture.
Guides.firstCardDesc: Indulge in the best croissants, bakeries, and world-class coffees.
Guides.secondCardDesc: Discover the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame, and charming streets of Paris.
Guides.thirdCardDesc: Follow our guide for a perfect day in Paris filled with adventure.
Guides.note: *Limited-time offer: Plan your trip today and get exclusive insights!

Blog.title: Learn from Our Journey
Blog.desc: Join us on a captivating adventure across the globe. Discover our travel tips, stories, and unique experiences from exploring different countries.

Follow.title: Join Us on Instagram
Follow.subTitle: Experience the world through our lens! Follow us as we share stunning travel photos, behind-the-scenes moments, and unforgettable stories.
Follow.firstCardDesc: Get inspired by breathtaking shots of iconic places and hidden gems.
Follow.secondCardDesc: Discover heartwarming stories and moments that make our trips special.
Follow.thirdCardDesc: Follow our journey in real time and stay connected to our adventures.

Footer.title: About Us
Footer.subTitle: We are passionate twin travelers sharing stories, tips, and experiences to inspire your next adventure.
Footer.question: Have questions or want to collaborate? Reach out to us!
